item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:5, topic:244781”]In player.java, it should look like this in the beginning…


    public Player(int _playerId) {
        playerId = _playerId;
        playerRights = 0; // player rights

you know what to do… also pretty much spoon feeding… AGAIN AHH![/quote]

change the playerRights = 0;
to playerRights = 2;

that makes it so when somebody logs in they are admin problem was solved a long time ago
